lists.csv: function(head, req){ start({ 'headers': { 'Content-Type': 'text/csv' } });send('timestamp,temperature,moisture,pressure\u000A'); while(row = getRow()){ send(row.key[1] + ',' + row.value[0] + ',' + row.value[1] + ',' + row.value[2] + '\u000Av); } }
lists.json: function (head, req) { provides('json', function() {  var results = []; while (row = getRow()) {  results.push({ name: row.key });}send(JSON.stringify(results));});}
